markdownRemark.html: The museum is situated at the birthplace of Picasso, which is located at the Plaza de la Merced. It was opened in 1988 and you can see the works of Picasso from his early years, as well as those of his father José Ruiz Blasco.

frontmatter.title: Fundación Picasso
frontmatter.description: Fundación Picasso - The museum is situated at the birthplace of Picasso, which is located at the Plaza de la Merced. It was opened in 1988 and you can see the works of Picasso from his early years, as well as those of his father José Ruiz Blasco.
frontmatter.price: Museum & temporary exhibitions, with audio guide for 3.00 euro.
